kpi.name: M8006C209

kpi_info.title: Successfully established initial E-RABs of QCI4
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established intial E-RABs of QCI4. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi.kpi_alias: Successfully established initial E-RABs of QCI4
